"Great job. Yes, I've received the opera: "...I see, so it's like this. Live data really is a whole different beast."
"The drive system's load is crazy. While it boosted its mobility, the reduced durability is a tough pill to swallow..."
"Ahaha... Doesn't seeing her so absorbed in her work like this kind of remind you of Xiera a bit?"
"Now that you mention it..."
"They don't look similar at all."
"See what I mean? Almost like they're long lost siblings..."
"I'm not talking about their appearance. I meant that they look similar when they're focused on their work."
"But it must just be my imagination. Xiera's the only High Cast on the ships."
"I guess that would make us similar. Either way, I am a High Cast. Ludmilla type."
"Huh? Really?"
"After Void was disbanded, the Research Division got shuffled around during the ARKS reorganization."
"There weren't any geniuses like Luther after everything got moved around, but there were tons of experts in individual fields."
"They gathered up all their knowledge and experience into a database, and applied it to a computation-specialized module."
"And that's how I was made. I'm the Research Division's A.I.S. Specialized High Cast, Ludmilla."

"I see! So there are other High Casts besides
Xiera."
"Yup. And it's my sworn duty to thoroughly research, improve, and exceed in the field of A.I.S."
"Which means I need all the data on them I can get for my work."
"So get me everything you can. Toodles."
"Hearing all of that really makes me want to help, even though I'm not any good at piloting them."

"Alright, I'll do my best! Let's help out
together, <%me>!"
